summary: Frontend-only testing completed for Senha Comunicação website clone. All major features working correctly including hero section, navigation, portfolio grayscale hover effect, contact form with toast notification, and mobile responsiveness.
critical_code_review_comments: Contact form submission is MOCKED - only shows toast, does not actually send emails
All components properly structured with good separation of concerns
Intersection Observer for scroll animations implemented correctly
Portfolio grayscale hover effect working as expected
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend features tested and working. Site is a pixel-perfect clone with: Hero section with video background, badge, stats (30+, 500+, 200+, 98%), 2 CTA buttons; Download PDF button; Quem Somos section with Nosso Propósito box; Por Que Escolher section with 4 cards; Nossos Serviços with 6 service cards; Portfolio with 6 projects and grayscale-to-color hover effect; CTA section with red gradient; Contact form with 5 fields (Nome, Empresa, Email, WhatsApp, Mensagem) and hover effects; Footer with WhatsApp CTA, logo, 4 social icons, copyright; WhatsApp floating button; Fixed header with navigation and social icons. Mobile responsive.

hero_section.details: Badge '30 Anos Transformando Marcas', title 'Marketing Digital de Resultado', subtitle, 2 CTA buttons (Solicitar Proposta, Falar no WhatsApp), stats (30+, 500+, 200+, 98%) all present and working

pdf_download_button.details: Download button present with correct PDF link

quem_somos_section.details: Section with text and 'Nosso Propósito' box present

por_que_escolher_section.details: 4 cards present: 30 Anos de Expertise, Foco em Resultados, Soluções 360°, Marketing Imobiliário

nossos_servicos_section.details: 6 service cards present: Branding & Identidade, Gestão de Mídias Sociais, Marketing de Performance, Marketing de Conteúdo, Sites & E-commerce, Assessoria de Comunicação

portfolio_section.details: 6 projects with grayscale images that become colored on hover. Hover effect shows 'Ver Projeto' overlay

cta_section.details: Red gradient background with 'Pronto para Transformar Seu Negócio?' title and 2 buttons

contact_form.details: 5 fields (Nome, Empresa, Email, WhatsApp, Mensagem) with hover effects. Form submission shows success toast. NOTE: Form is MOCKED - does not actually send emails

footer.details: WhatsApp CTA section, logo, 4 circular social icons (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter), copyright text, Emergent badge

whatsapp_floating_button.details: Green floating button in bottom right corner with pulse animation

header.details: Fixed header with logo, navigation menu (Sobre, Serviços, Portfólio, Contato), 4 social icons, 'Fale Conosco' button. Header becomes opaque on scroll

navigation.details: All navigation links scroll smoothly to respective sections

mobile_responsiveness.details: Site is fully responsive on mobile (390x844 viewport tested)

scroll_animations.details: Intersection Observer implemented for fade-in animations on scroll

mocked_apis.contact_form_submission: Form submission is MOCKED - shows success toast but does not actually send emails
